summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2133, for the improvement of a main trunk sewer of drainage district to be known as the "Connecticut Street Trunk Sewer District," by the construction within said district of a main trunk sewer and a branch sewer along certain described routes, in accordance with certain maps, plans and specifications therefore under Ordinance No. 21470, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
